website_summaries.verdict: A Rihanna Fenty lookalike at a fraction of the cost.
pros: Satin slides with trendy bow feels good on the feet
They can easily dress up a low-key or athletic leisure outfit
cons: Bow can run tight over the foot

customer_reviews.title: Love ❤ these slides
customer_reviews.text: I originally wanted the Fenty slides but these are cheaper and exactly the same look and feel as the Fenty shoes. I love mine im also going buy another pair. They run small i wear a 9 but i bought a 10. Fits perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: Go up a size
customer_reviews.text: i wear a 7-7 1/2 depending on the shoe, but i notice that with slides i usually have to go a size up. got an 8 and they fit perfect. only thing is the bows are tied a little different for each slide (at least on my pair). gunna try and see if i can just re-tie it myself. other than that, theyre really cute and since theyre a nude pink/ rose gold, they can be worn with almost anything. comfort wise id give them 8/10.
customer_reviews.author: sami

customer_reviews.title: Niiice
customer_reviews.text: Looove them. Arrived as expected. Im a size 9 and they are very true to size.. a half size would not have hurt. Will order in black
customer_reviews.author: MASTERDear3st 👑

customer_reviews.title: A MUST BUY FOR ANYONE LOOKING FOR FENTY BOW DUPES
customer_reviews.text: Steve Madden has done it again! Great purchase! They fit soooo good! Very very comfortable and look really pretty in person. I am glad I decided to go with these vs. the fenty ones. I love RiRi and all but I just didn't see spending 100+ on slides so this was a perfect alternative. I am buying the black pair next!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Cute, fit well, stay on.
customer_reviews.text: Cute slides. Love the fit, do not understand other reviews claiming they run small? Perhaps it's my floral fabric choice, but they are a true size 8, length and width.I am taking away a star, because the shoes are two completely different fabrics.Both black chinoiserie prints, but one has blue, the other doesn't. They are still cute, but the OCD in me is challenged.
customer_reviews.author: RockNRose

customer_reviews.title: Chemical Smell
customer_reviews.text: Horrible chemical smell. I'm not a picky person and I can deal with a bit of a smell from a new product. But the smell coming from these shoes was overwhelming. When I first opened the bag it frightened me a bit. I was hoping that it was just the bag and not the shoes but alas, it was the shoes. I'm not sure if it's just my pair because I haven't seen others post this problem. I bought these for my daughter but I'm not comfortable with her putting on something with that type of chemical smell. The shoes look great but I'll have to return.
customer_reviews.author: troutlady

customer_reviews.title: They broke after only 3 months!
customer_reviews.text: I loved these and they just broke on me after only having them for 3 months. They were used as House slippers after having foot problems post partem. They never even went outside. I’m very bummed about this as they were not cheap!
customer_reviews.author: jackie

customer_reviews.title: Didn't have to size up, as others suggested. ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't have to size up, as others suggested. The color is more dusty rose than I thought it would be, but that's how they were going to get on the street anyway! The bottom is a bit stiff--not as comfy as the Skechers non-bowed slip-ons--and the sole is slippery on hardwood floors. Since I plan to wear them out, hopefully that won't be much of a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Intellectual Romantic

customer_reviews.title: Loved them but...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are absolutely gorgeous and I received numerous compliments unfortunately they fell apart rather quickly. The bow started peeling from the sides on both shoes and when I try to locate them on Amazon to get another pair they were no longer available.
customer_reviews.author: Shacoma Waddell

customer_reviews.title: Big bow
customer_reviews.text: The more you wear them the bigger they become and bow is huge.
customer_reviews.author: MamaB

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Last
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product in January 2018 and began wearing the product in April 2018. By August 2018 the Steve Madden logo had washed away and the soles began to crack. The shoes retain water so if you hear noises it's probably the sandal. Otherwise, the satin bow and surrounding parts are extremely durable. They are still cute.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki C.

customer_reviews.title: If you are looking, get these.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter in her 22nd birthday. She is very fashion conscious and she absolutely loves these. There are other brands that don't look very durable. These are well made.
customer_reviews.author: Henry T. Stone

customer_reviews.title: I love them but yeah they look like pajama slippers...
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THESE SHOES!!!! I’ll admit they do look like slippers so if your looking for slides you can wear to work or like anywhere else I would not buy these cause it will straight up look like your wearing your pajamas ... at least the pink ones do.
customer_reviews.author: StephMargaret

customer_reviews.title: They are beautiful sandals but in unfortunately in my case the sizing ...
customer_reviews.text: They say to order a size up bc they run small, I am a size 8 so i ordered a size 9 and they still seem to be quite small. My foot fits right to the edge. They are beautiful sandals but in unfortunately in my case the sizing is a bit of an issue.
customer_reviews.author: BABYBOO125

customer_reviews.title: and I'm so glad I did
customer_reviews.text: They are cute but they run small. I wear a size 9, but after reading all the reviews, I decided to buy a size 10, and I'm so glad I did! I highly recommend ordering a size up from your regular size. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: E.Hun

customer_reviews.title: They run small... i wear a size ...
customer_reviews.text: They run small...i wear a size 7 and ordered a 7 originally and they were way too small went a full size up to the 8 and they fit!
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Cute slides to wear during my hospital stay!
customer_reviews.text: Quality name brand slides! I love Steven madden products, these are very classy looking. I can wear them out as well as when I am laboring/postpartum in the hospital! Super cute! I am a size 8.5 and the 9 fit perfect. If I had went with an 8 it would’ve definitely been too small.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: These are good if you don't want to spend a fortune on ...
customer_reviews.text: These are good if you don't want to spend a fortune on the name brand ones. I found that my feet started to hurt after wearing them for awhile around the house, Maybe the run a little narrow.
customer_reviews.author: cordiva

customer_reviews.title: Order up one size, and then you are good!
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute and comfy! These do run small though. I am usually a size 8 and I ordered a 9, so they fit perfectly! Very happy with them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: These sandal is so cute! They fit as expected. They work really well as house slippers. Very comfortable and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: they are pretty wide - if you have narrow feet - you ...
customer_reviews.text: they are pretty wide - if you have narrow feet - you may not like. However, the form-fitting on the sole makes them non-slip. I've gotten many compliments on them! Super cute
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are so comfortable! I just leave them by the front door ...
customer_reviews.text: They are so comfortable! I just leave them by the front door and slip them on whenever I go out! I haven't tried to walk too far in them as I don't want them for that! I would recommend them. I love the color too!
customer_reviews.author: Kidsyogamum

customer_reviews.title: Classy
customer_reviews.text: I would give it a five but the Bow detail on one shoe over hangs the main body and looks different from the other foot. But they a cute and feel good and I like the material they are made with for walking in or out doors and easy clean up and wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: mike hausle

customer_reviews.title: Get a size larger cause they run small.
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for this shoe since I bought the all black pair at steve madden shoe store in the mall a year or so ago and I finally found them. I'm glad I know how they already fit since I have a pair already I love these shoes they're comfortable to wear and its multicolored I can where them with anything just like my black ones.
customer_reviews.author: Phylicia Colding

customer_reviews.title: Not as comfortable as expected for a slip on shoe
customer_reviews.text: Not as comfortable as expected for a slip on shoe. The material did stretch after wear but still not a comfortable slip on. The style for the shoe is very cute and the color is exactly as pictured. I have other Steve Madden shoes and this does not meet the comfort quotient.
customer_reviews.author: J Dabney-Dortch

customer_reviews.title: Pretty in Pink!
customer_reviews.text: Blush pink, a silky bow, comfortable and cute - what is NOT to love about this sandal! Fits really well and even has molded area under toes that encourages them to stay straight. A must have!
customer_reviews.author: ease mum

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: I love these slides. Warning, busy print. But very cute. I added a gold designer pin (brooch) and made these slides even more wow.
customer_reviews.author: busyBio

customer_reviews.title: So small
customer_reviews.text: Seriously soooooooo small, flat and narrow. Not for wide thick feet. I sized up and t still was tight. Very cute but I don’t know who’s foot is fitting in that slide.
customer_reviews.author: MomLyph

customer_reviews.title: Size & Fit
customer_reviews.text: They are true to size! I wear a 6 and the slipper contors my foot perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Y

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: Wish my toes were cuter, 'cause every time I wear these people stare at my feet. I get compliments every time I wear them! So girly, but somehow quirky, too.
customer_reviews.author: Yogo

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are amazing! I am a 6
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are amazing! I am a 6.5-7 and they fit perfect so if you're a true 7 they might be too snug! They are made very well and are extremely comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Avery

customer_reviews.title: My mom looks so cute in these! There's a ...
customer_reviews.text: My mom looks so cute in these! There's a bit of arch support and follows the curve of your foot. She loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Cinzia

customer_reviews.title: She stated they fit well and are comfortable sandals. We are pleased with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these slides as a gift for my wife. She stated they fit well and are comfortable sandals. We are pleased with the purchase. The fit is true to size so order accordingly. I would recommend purchasing a pair to lounging around the pool, quick mall trips. etc....
customer_reviews.author: LordSakda

customer_reviews.title: She is very happy & they fit perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these as a gift for my niece. She is very happy & they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Blessed 4 Life

customer_reviews.title: Order a size up!
customer_reviews.text: These look very cute and I love the soft satin material and the olive color. I am a size 8 and I ordered a size 8 but it feels a bit tight and my toes/heel are almost hanging out of the sandal. I recommend ordering a size up. The sole is a very hard material and not the most comfortable to walk on. There is almost no grip on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Syd L.

customer_reviews.title: I bought this as a gift for my sister. ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my sister .. she is a 6 and a half but I got her a size 7. These shoes run small. So I would suggest rounding up the size. 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn

customer_reviews.title: I love this and get so many compliments on it
customer_reviews.text: I love this and get so many compliments on it! It is a smidge wide, but seems it needs to be for the style. Being that it is a bit wide, it still fits my foot very well. I got a 6 which is my shoe size
customer_reviews.author: Cherie Bourgeois

customer_reviews.title: REALLY WANTED THE SANDALS
customer_reviews.text: It's cute and came in great condition. I ordered my right size but it fits a size down. Really disappointed about that😣
customer_reviews.author: Keisha

customer_reviews.title: No.
customer_reviews.text: Surprised by the good reviews. These cover your toe area and do not cover the top of your foot as the style should - I'm sure as a way to cut costs. This completely changes the look of the shoe. The quality isn't great, looks cheap. They feel more like a house slipper than anything else and I have a few pairs in this style that cost less / look better. Would have sent back, but the box was thrown away by my house mate! These will not be worn, waste of $40.
customer_reviews.author: Shara ChesTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: These shoes don't fit my foot right. Darling shoes but had to send them back.
customer_reviews.author: Ann_H

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought a size larger and it fits great. These are really cute and well made
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Really pretty slide on shoe. Its a little snug but the length is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Sheba

customer_reviews.title: I love these adorable slip on sandals
customer_reviews.text: I love these adorable slip on sandals. They do need to be worn a few times before they feel comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: ann sullivan

customer_reviews.title: The actual park where my foot steps on is very comfortable though.
customer_reviews.text: I have a wide foot so I expected it to not fit...im a size 6 and stuck with a 7 and its still a little to tight on me. The actual park where my foot steps on is very comfortable though.
customer_reviews.author: Roshina M.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable :)
customer_reviews.text: My usual size is 7.5 or 8, the size 8 fits nicely. Comfortable sandals
customer_reviews.author: Salpho

customer_reviews.title: Not for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: Super cute but didn't fit. I'm a 71/2 because my feet are wide I ordered 8 and they were WAY to tight. I could've worn them and let them stretch but I'm scared the material would eventually rip from the sandal
customer_reviews.author: Marisa

customer_reviews.title: Steve Madden Slides
customer_reviews.text: If your size 7.5 get size 8 as I expected.Great comfy slide.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can’t Wait To Get Every Color!
customer_reviews.text: These are so beautiful and comfortable that I want to get them in other colors! I wear either a 7.5 or 8 shoe, and I purchased the size 8 and it fits perfectly! I feel as though my arch is supported, and the strap isn’t too tight. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kmdoebert

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love my slides but be aware that they run small!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: they look great and are mostly
customer_reviews.text: No complaints so far, they look great and are mostly comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: I do recommend getting a size up as they do tend to ...
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute and comfy. I do recommend getting a size up as they do tend to run small. I wear a 6 and the 7 is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So comfy, runs tight at first.
customer_reviews.text: Loved my slides! They are so cute and durable. At first they were a little tight on the top of my foot, but after wearing them for a few days they loosened up. Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Linda M. W

customer_reviews.title: While the sandal was very pretty, was made with good strong material
customer_reviews.text: While the sandal was very pretty, was made with good strong material, and looked better than on pictures; it was not a good fit
customer_reviews.author: Tay Tay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and really comfortable. Don't buy any off brand of these, these have soft padding on the top and are amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Pegggg

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe but does run small.
customer_reviews.text: Super cute & comfy! Love them so much I ordered a pair in black as well. Only suggestion is to go 1 size up as they seem to run small. I'm normally a 7.5 or 8. Ordered an 8 and it was almost too small. Decided to return for a 9 which fit great.
customer_reviews.author: KJL121

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: I love these blush slides. They are comfy and super cute. My niece is obsessed with them!! So am I and it looks so good with a nice pair of jeans. Perfect for movie night.
customer_reviews.author: Karlene Sween

customer_reviews.title: Sizes are advertised wrong
customer_reviews.text: very unsatisfied. It was supposed to be a size 11 but fit like a size 9. I gave them to my daughter because I didn't want to go through the process of sending them back.
customer_reviews.author: Davina Franklin

customer_reviews.title: beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: gorgeous! the color is greener than the picture, but it looks even better in person
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Suarez

customer_reviews.title: Other than that i love the color and I have a bookbag purse to
customer_reviews.text: Had to order a size up so my feet wouldn't look forced or so my heel wouldn't be right on the edge. Other than that i love the color and I have a bookbag purse to match
customer_reviews.author: Chassity

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved the shoes...just a little tight on me but very cute...
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: I’m an 8 but I listened to the comments and got a 9 and that was a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: I agree, go one size larger. I’m an 8 but I listened to the comments and got a 9 and that was a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: I loved these, they do run small so get a size bigger, but overall i loved them
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Irina
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shoe but it is to tight. My foot doesnt fit and there is no way to make it bigger. Im not able to use the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Irina Fuentes

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable! I'm usually a size 5
customer_reviews.text: Cute shoes, very comfortable! I'm usually a size 5, read that it runs small and ordered 6. Perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Aisha Ohm

customer_reviews.title: Fred Flintstone shoes
customer_reviews.text: These looked like Fred Flintsone shoes. I sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: robbin hudson

customer_reviews.title: Other than that I love the sandals
customer_reviews.text: Just a little short in the toe area. Other than that I love the sandals.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I looooove them😍 they’re very comfortable and true to size
customer_reviews.author: Nashaun Davis

customer_reviews.title: Fit like a child's shoe
customer_reviews.text: Band was very small. Fit like a child's shoe, but length was right on.
customer_reviews.author: kalena karp

customer_reviews.title: they are gorgeous and very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Runs very small! Other than that, they are gorgeous and very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute but size deceiving
customer_reviews.text: They look nice but they were too small, and I ordered a size up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: they feel like somebody wore them
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are being returned, they feel like somebody wore them already
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! So cute and comfy. They do run small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and different!
customer_reviews.text: Had to get a size larger because of my hammer toes but they fit. Think I'd like them better with a lighter colored insole, but otherwise they're quite cute.
customer_reviews.author: Shoe Maven

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Size Up
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear 7.5 for flats, but since the reviews say it runs small I sized up to a 9. The problem is not the length but the bow part. I have normal feet and size 9 is still a little tight. The bow is much more satin than the photos and super cute so I'll keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Niki Tang

product_meta.title: Steve Madden Women's Silky Flat Sandal
product_meta.description:
At once sporty and glamorous, this girly take on the ever-popular spa slide crosses a classic rubber sole with a high-shine satin upper and charmingly oversized bow. color-matched materials ensure a polished look.

What began as a modest $1100 investment in 1990 has developed into one of the most iconic brands in footwear. From a factory in Queens, NY, Steve Madden has revolutionized the shoe industry, merging years of experience with unique and creative designs. Inspired by rock and roll and his New York roots, his vision to provide on-trend women and men with an outlet to express their individuality is innovative, daring, and inspiring. Steve’s innate understanding of trends and unparalleled willpower have resulted in millions of customers worldwide and propelled his designs to the forefront of fashion. He has expanded the Steve Madden brand into a true lifestyle and destination for footwear, handbags and accessories, sold in over 80 countries worldwide. It’s about authenticity. It’s about embracing individuality. It’s Steve Madden.
